marginTopD.title: Desktop: Spacing From Top
marginTopD.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing from the top (Default is 0)

marginBottomD.title: Desktop: Spacing From Bottom
marginBottomD.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing from the bottom (Default is 0)

marginLeftD.title: Desktop: Spacing From Left
marginLeftD.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing from the left (Default is 0)

marginRightD.title: Desktop: Spacing From Right
marginRightD.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing from the right (Default is 0)

marginInBetweenD.title: Desktop: Spacing Between Multiple Contents
marginInBetweenD.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing between multiple contents vertically (Default is 0)

marginTopM.title: Mobile: Spacing From Top
marginTopM.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing from the top (Default is 0)

marginBottomM.title: Mobile: Spacing From Bottom
marginBottomM.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing from the bottom (Default is 0)

marginLeftM.title: Mobile: Spacing From Left
marginLeftM.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing from the left (Default is 0)

marginRightM.title: Mobile: Spacing From Right
marginRightM.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing from the right (Default is 0)

marginInBetweenM.title: Mobile: Spacing Between Multiple Contents
marginInBetweenM.description: Enter a number value to add the spacing between multiple contents vertically (Default is 0)
